p: Coronaviruses are a family of viruses that usually cause mild upper respiratory tract infections, but mutations in the surface proteins of the virus can lead to severe lower respiratory tract infections such as the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS-CoV). Currently, a novel version of a coronavirus is causing epidemics of serious illness and death in humans. As it has been proved for other viral epidemics, this one is another zoonoses, infections transmitted from animals to people.
